title: LINE Corporation : consolidated revenue 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
The highest Quarter Q4 '19 has 52.6 more Revenue in billion Japanese yen than the lowest Quarter Q2 '13.
